EmailTemplate.name: VMworld Europe 2015 VIP Dinner.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: VMTurbo VMworld VIP Dinner Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name}}, You are confirmed! We're very excited to hear you'll be joining us at The Drake <http://www.drakesf.com/> on Monday, August 31st after a long day at VMworld. Get ready! Get excited! And make sure to stop by Booth #505, and learn about the future of the modern data center. VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception Monday, August 31, 2015 | 6:30 - 9:00 p.m. The Drake 508 4th Street San Francisco, CA 94107 - The VMTurbo Team
